duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide legal assistance to probate litigants, including preparing Guardianships, clearing notes, providing necessary notices, and preparing for Guardianship hearings.
Interview self-represented persons seeking assistance on probate and civil court law matters, including family and housing issues, and provide educational materials and information.
Work collaboratively with judiciary, court staff, and CA Bar to improve pro per access to the court.
Conduct workshops for individuals and training volunteers in family, consumer, housing or other civil matter workshops.
Ensure improved access to the court system for individuals seeking assistance in legal matters.

education_certification.credential: California Bar Exam certification, awaiting results
